name: Bingo Rush-Club Bingo Games
description:
Brand new free online bingo games in 2022! Enjoy a new bingo fun at home as you never had before on Bingo Rush with your families, friends and millions of bingo enthusiasts worldwide!

What are you waiting for? Come and explore the awesome and fascinating new bingo world on Bingo Rush! Don’t miss out on any surprises, and start your lucky day with Bingo Rush! Download and play on your phone now!

Brand New Bingo Home Decor
•Renovate your house with the decorations won from bingo games..
•Achieve more bingos to win more house and garden decorations!
•The more decorations, the more beautiful your house and garden will be!
•Log in for 7 consecutive days to earn a free exquisite villa!
•Try your luck and customize your own bingo garden!

Online and Active Bingo Club
•Create your own club and invite whoever you want to join your online bingo club!
•Help your club outrank other local and global clubs in the Club Rankings!
•Play together, win together and share the bingo fun!
•Ask your fellow club members for tickets and puzzle pieces and return the favors!
•Plenty of club bonuses await!

Rewarding and Exciting Bingo Games for All
•Take your bingo fun to the next level with multiple power-ups!
•Offers regular bingo game modes and special ones like Postage Stamp, “T”, “N” patterns and more!
•Different themed bingo games and tournaments await!
•Challenge others by playing 4-card games!
•The more cards you play in a higher level game, the richer rewards you’ll win!

Awesome Bonuses and Free Bingo Tickets
•Get free bingo tickets and bonuses every day!
•Log in for 7 consecutive days to earn a huge bonus!
•Various ways to earn free tickets..
•Ticket giveaway from time to time!
•Complete easy daily missions to claim tickets and bonuses!

Delicate Puzzles
•Choose the number of cards and win the puzzle pieces by playing the game!
•Puzzle types include dog, cat, beach, boat and ocean.
•Collect all the puzzles to make a complete puzzle collection and get rich rewards!

Keep a Free Pet Online
•Keep a free pet online in your bingo garden when you reach level 10.•A dog or a cat? It’s your choice! Don’t forget to feed it in time!
•Pet food can be obtained by helping club members every day!
•Stay tuned for more pet types in the near future.

Reach Out To Us
We will be pleased to hear from you! If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to get in touch with Bingo Rush at:
Email: cs@bingorushgame.net
Official Website: https://bingorushgame.net/
Facebook Fan Page: https://www.facebook.com/gaming/BingoRushGame

Bingo Rush contains optional in-app purchases. Bingo Rush is only intended for the adult players and for entertainment only. Bingo Rush will not offer real money and there is no opportunity to win any real money. Thank you for supporting Bingo Rush!
